description: A Lucas triangle: T(m,n), m >= n >= 0.
references: B. A. Bondarenko, Generalized Pascal Triangles and Pyramids (in Russian), FAN, Tashkent, 1990, ISBN 5-648-00738-8. English translation published by Fibonacci Association, Santa Clara Univ., Santa Clara, CA, 1993; see p. 28.
maple: T := proc(m, n) option remember: if m=0 and n=0 then RETURN(2) fi: if m=1 and n=0 then RETURN(1) fi: if m=1 and n=1 then RETURN(1) fi: if m=2 and n=1 then RETURN(2) fi: if m<=n+1 then RETURN(T(m, m-n)) fi: if m<n then RETURN(0) fi: T(m-1,n) + T(m-2,n): end:for m from 0 to 20 do for n from 0 to m do printf(`%d,`,T(m,n)) od: od: # _James A. Sellers_, Feb 22 2001
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 22 2001
